form.PN:
Samostalnik v ednini izgovarjamo
/m*a*UT/
, v množini pa
/m*a*UDz/
. Glagol izgovarjamo
/m*a*UD/
.

sense.def:
One's mouth
so človekove ustnice ali prostor za ustnicami, v katerem so zobje in jezik.

seg.quote: She opened her mouth to say something, then closed it.

sense.def:
The mouth of a cave, hole, or bottle
je prostor, skozi katerega se pride v votlino ali luknjo, ali odprtina na steklenici.

seg.quote: There was a vicious snarling in the mouth of the shelter.

sense.def:
The mouth of a river
je kraj, kjer se reka izteka v morje.

seg.quote: We lived near the mouth of the Bashee River.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mouthes something
, oblikuje besede z ustnicami, ne da bi spregovoril na glas.
